FuncDef: This command can be used to override specific attributes of the specified queue s MBS parameters. The MBS is a mechanism to override the default maximum size for the queue.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum number of kbytes of buffering allowed for the queue. For a value of 100 kb/s, enter the number 100. A value of 0 causes the queue to discard all packets. Values-0 to 2625 kilobytes.
